data.name: NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Extend your experience with the NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER Season Pass! The Season Pass gives you access to 9 Master Character Training Packs.

SEASON PASS BONUS:
Includes Jiraiya Costume with Shima & Fukasaku Replica.
data.about_the_game:
Extend your experience with the NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER Season Pass! The Season Pass gives you access to 9 Master Character Training Packs.

data.short_description: Extend your experience with the NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER Season Pass! The Season Pass gives you access to 9 Master Character Training Packs. SEASON PASS BONUS: Includes Jiraiya Costume with Shima & Fukasaku Replica.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
